title: Astronomers renew concerns about Starlink satellite brightness
summary: As SpaceX gears up for another launch of Starlink satellites, astronomers are concerned the company maybe backsliding in its efforts to reduce the brightness of those satellites.

title: SpaceX fires employees involved in letter rebuking Musk
summary: SpaceX has fired employees who helped write and distribute an open letter criticizing Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk's behavior, the New York Times reported on Friday, citing three employees with knowledge of the situation.

title: Astronomers want “strong finish” for SOFIA
summary: The organization that operates an airborne astronomical observatory that NASA is shutting down this year wants to end the project on a high note.

title: NASA assigns two astronauts to Starliner test flight
summary: NASA has assigned two veteran astronauts to the first crewed flight of Boeing’s CST-100 Starliner spacecraft in the latest reshuffling of personnel assigned to the long-delayed mission.

title: Europe’s major new rocket, the Ariane 6, is delayed again
summary: "This is a source of challenge in every launcher development."
